Possibly, a few seconds have passed. The onlookers reopened their eyes, with great fear of what a horrible and brutal sight awaits them. To be precise, it was horrible and brutal but not the kind they were expecting. It was the one with the sword bleeding profusely from his, very likely shattered, nose and lying on the ground.
The one with the club, quite understanably, was trembling with fear and decided to leg it. He tossed his club away and ran as far as he could. Sensible people would just let him go by now. She was not a sensible person. She rushed to the running man and punched him right in the forehead. Then, something amazing happened. The man was lifted up in the air from the impact. While the man was briefly breaking the laws of gravity like they were mere parking tickets, the woman began to throw multiple blows at him. The witnesses all say that it was something rather beautiful. A piece of art, to be more precise.
As the man was about to hit the ground,she gave a final kick and the man tumbled towards a fruit stand nearby. She gave the owner of the fruit stand 3 pieces of gold for the damage and told the owner that
"When these major malfunctioning numbnuts wake up, tell them, it ain't a gentleman-like behaviour to attack a lady while wielding weapon."
